text: d/or radiation therapy.     - If cancer is in the nasal vestibule, treatment is usually surgery or radiation therapy.    - For inverting papilloma, treatment is usually surgery with or without radiation therapy.     - For melanoma and sarcoma, treatment is usually surgery with or without radiation therapy and chemotherapy.     - For midline granuloma, treatment is usually radiation therapy.
